name: Oath of Vengeance
description: Paladins who swear the Oath of Vengeance pledge to punish wrongdoers with the fury of a righteous storm, dedicating themselves to hunting down evildoers.

Oath Spells.description: You always have certain spells prepared.

3.Abjure Enemy: As a Channel Divinity action, choose one creature within 60 feet. The target must make a Wisdom save unless it's immune to being Frightened. On a failed save, it is Frightened for 1 minute or until it takes damage. While Frightened, the creature's Speed is 0, and it can't benefit from bonuses to its Speed. On a successful save, the creature's Speed is halved for 1 minute or until it takes damage.
3.Vow of Enmity: As a Channel Divinity Bonus Action, you utter a vow of enmity against a creature within 10 feet. You gain Advantage on attack rolls against the creature for 1 minute or until it drops to 0 Hit Points or falls Unconscious.

7.Relentless Avenger: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, you can move up to half your Speed immediately after the attack as part of the same Reaction. This movement doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks.

15.Soul of Vengeance: The authority you have established over your Vow of Enmity target allows you to strike with supernatural speed. When a creature under the effect of your Vow of Enmity makes an attack, you can use your Reaction to make a melee weapon attack against it.

20.Avenging Angel: As a Bonus Action, you sprout spectral wings and transform for 1 hour. You gain a Flying Speed of 60 feet, and you emanate an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, it must succeed on a Wisdom save or become Frightened for 1 minute or until it takes damage. Attack rolls against the Frightened creature have Advantage. Once used, can't use again until Long Rest.
